elements.text:
National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) Helpline

NAMI provides vital resources and raises public awareness to combat stigma. If you are struggling with your mental health, connect with a NAMI volunteer Monday – Friday, 10 a.m. – 10 p.m., EST by calling 1-800-950-NAMI (6264), texting "HelpLine" to 62640, or clicking "Chat with us" on their site.

https://www.nami.org/help



Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA)

ADAA offers in-depth information on treatment and resources for anxiety, depression, and co-occurring disorders. Find free online peer-to-peer communities, a support group locator, and a “Search for an ADAA Member Telemental Health Provider in Your Area” function on their site.

https://adaa.org/
